niga: If you're reading this then it works.
chest: Left-click the chest to open it.
double-check: Are you sure you have explore everything in the first room?
tutorial: See the boulder to the right of this sign?
You can access it's property by left-clicking it.
After that, figure out a way to get to the next room!
tablet_unavailable: You do not have a tablet to manipulate this object!
new-script: Scripts are scattered in the dungeon.
Collect them to unlock the ability to edit certain properties.
Now you can make the vine burnable!
torch: Right click to burn object using it.
sorry: We are sorry for the lack of features.
We will add more features in the future update.
